main event: An unidentified flying object was observed on 16 September 1957 in Southern Italy.
interesting points: The object was round, about the size of Mars and emitted no sound or exhaust., The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes before the object disappeared behind mountains., The object maintained a straight course at the same altitude and did not maneuver., The observers were traveling on Route No. 96 when the sighting occurred., The weather was clear and visibility was reported as 12 kilometers.
witness description: an American citizen and his wife, the wife first noticed the object
